item.title: Audio Control Panels – Captain’s Audio Control Panel

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided First Observer’s audio control panel is operative.

numlitem.para: Position Overhead Panel OBS AUDIO SYSTEM switch to CAPT. Captain’s audio equipment is connected to the First Observer’s audio panel.

placard.para: Placard inoperative Audio Control Panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
